title: Why don't we in Oce get a tribunal
body: I'm sure there is a reason for this but I can't think of one. I would love to part take in a tribunal and I'm sure a large portion of Oce does as well

replies.body:
Greetings. 

The Tribunal is currently in recess so I believe that must be the reason to it not being available.
Thank you but could I have an idea of what recess means, not trying to be rude

Recess is when everyone goes out to have a break.

Thing is though, recess normally lasts ten minutes; not years.
I think that would be something like repair or sort of thing.  They are reforming it. I don't really know. That's what comes up for me when I attempt to access Tribunal. :/
